document_data.name: Downybeard Tobacconist
document_data.location: Corner of [[Undal's Lane]] & [[Golden Serpent Street]], [[Waterdeep/North Ward]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Downybeard Tobacconist''' was a shop that specialized in the sale of [[tobacco]] products located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The shop was situated in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the southeast corner of [[Undal's Lane]] where it joined [[Golden Serpent Street]].
